column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I always love going to the Art Institute. I had a memorable experience the first time I went
column2: on my first trip to Chicago in spring 2001. Love some of the shows they come up with beyond the usual suspects and the biggies. This trip was specifically to see Bisa Butler
column3: which is one of the most beautiful exhibits I've ever seen
column5: everyone else feels the same way
column6: because I couldn't buy the book for her show
column7: as it's in its fourth printing! I've gotten many books through the years of the thoughtful exhibits seen here so that I can revisit them later. This is a classic place
column8: that continues bringing exciting and fun exhibits to Chicago. Always worth a visit!
